  • Sequence-to-sequence modelì€ Conditional Language Modelì˜ í•œ ì˜ˆì‹œ
    • Decoderê°€ target sentence yyyì˜ ë‹¤ìŒ ë‹¨ì–´ë¥¼ ì˜ˆì¸¡í•˜ë¯€ë¡œ language modelì´ë¼ í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŒ.

Introduction to Attention

The Bottleneck Problem of Seq2Seq

Attention

Sequence-to-Sequence with Attention

Attention: In Equations

  • Procedure
    1. Encoder hidden states h1,â€¦,hNâˆˆRhh_1, \dots, h_N \in \mathbb{R}^hh1â€‹,â€¦,hNâ€‹âˆˆRh ë³´ìœ

    1. Softmaxë¥¼ ì·¨í•´ ì´ ë‹¨ê³„ì˜ attention distribution Î±t\alpha_tÎ±tâ€‹ íšë“ (í™•ë¥  ë¶„í¬ì´ë©° í•©ì€ 1)

    Î±t=softmax(et)âˆˆRN\alpha^t = \text{softmax}(e^t) \in \mathbb{R}^N Î±t=softmax(et)âˆˆRN

    1. Î±t\alpha_tÎ±tâ€‹ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì—¬ encoder hidden statesì˜ weighted sumì¸ attention output ata_tatâ€‹ ê³„ì‚°

    1. ë§ˆì§€ë§‰ìœ¼ë¡œ attention output ata_tatâ€‹ë¥¼ decoder hidden state sts_tstâ€‹ì™€ concatenateí•˜ê³  non-attention seq2seq modelê³¼ ê°™ì´ ì§„í–‰

From RNN to Attention-Based NLP Models Self-Attention

Self-Attention

As of Last Lecture: Recurrent Models for (Most) NLP

Issues with Recurrent Models: Linear Interaction Distance

  • RNNì€ "Left-to-right"ë¡œ unrolled(ì…ë ¥ì„ ë°›ì•„ë“¤ì—¬ ì²˜ë¦¬)ë¨
    • ì´ëŠ” Linear localityë¥¼ ì¸ì½”ë”©í•˜ë©° ìœ ìš©í•œ heuristic

Self-Attention Hypothetical Example

Self-Attention: Keys, Queries, Values from the Same Sequence

  • ë‹¨ì–´ì¥ VVV ë‚´ì˜ ë‹¨ì–´ sequence w1:nw_{1:n}w1:nâ€‹ ê°€ì •
    • ì˜ˆ: "Zuko made his uncle tea"
  • ê° wiw_iwiâ€‹ì— ëŒ€í•´ xi=Ewix_i = Ew_ixiâ€‹=Ewiâ€‹ (ì—¬ê¸°ì„œ EâˆˆRdÃ—VE \in \mathbb{R}^{d \times V}EâˆˆRdÃ—VëŠ” embedding matrix)
  1. ê° word embeddingì„ weight matrices Q,K,VQ, K, VQ,K,V (ê°ê° RdÃ—d\mathbb{R}^{d \times d}RdÃ—d)ë¡œ ë³€í™˜

qi=QxiÂ (queries),ki=KxiÂ (keys),vi=VxiÂ (Values)q_i = Qx_i \text{ (queries)}, \quad k_i = Kx_i \text{ (keys)}, \quad v_i = Vx_i \text{ (Values)} qiâ€‹=Qxiâ€‹Â (queries),kiâ€‹=Kxiâ€‹Â (keys),viâ€‹=Vxiâ€‹Â (Values)

  1. Keysì™€ queries ê°„ì˜ pairwise similarities ê³„ì‚° ë° softmaxë¡œ ì •ê·œí™”

ei,j=qiâ‹…kj,Î±i,j=expâ¡(ei,j)âˆ‘kexpâ¡(ei,k)e_{i,j} = q_i \cdot k_j, \quad \alpha_{i,j} = \frac{\exp(e_{i,j})}{\sum_{k} \exp(e_{i,k})} ei,jâ€‹=qiâ€‹â‹…kjâ€‹,Î±i,jâ€‹=âˆ‘kâ€‹exp(ei,kâ€‹)exp(ei,jâ€‹)â€‹

  1. ê° ë‹¨ì–´ì— ëŒ€í•œ ì¶œë ¥ì„ Valuesì˜ weighted sumìœ¼ë¡œ ê³„ì‚°

Barriers & Solutions for Self-Attention as A Building Block

  • Barrier(ì¥ì• ë¬¼): ìˆœì„œì— ëŒ€í•œ ê³ ìœ í•œ ê°œë… ë¶€ì¬
    • Solution: Inputì— position representation ì¶”ê°€
  • Barrier: Deep Learningì„ ìœ„í•œ nonlinearity ë¶€ì¬ (ë‹¨ì§€ weighted averageì¼ ë¿ì„)
    • Solution: ê° self-attention outputì— ë™ì¼í•œ feedforward network ì ìš©
  • Barrier: Sequence ì˜ˆì¸¡ ì‹œ ë¯¸ë˜ë¥¼ ë³´ì§€ ì•Šë„ë¡ ë³´ì¥ í•„ìš”
    • Machine translationì˜ ê²½ìš°

    • Solution: Attention weightë¥¼ ì¸ìœ„ì ìœ¼ë¡œ 0ìœ¼ë¡œ ì„¤ì •í•˜ì—¬ ë¯¸ë˜ë¥¼ mask out
